Name: Physics Sandbox VR
About the game: Simple Physics Sandbox Game! Grab Some Tools And Make Your Own Fun! Open the Menu and Pick An Item, Gun Or tool! You can use them to create fun physics scenes. Make domino tracks, spawn ragdolls, place explosives, or just attach thrusters and watch them fly. Earn cash and unlock more fun tools like the Remote car and Linking gun. Menu
